pages.title: Radio Jukeboxes
pages.text: Ever dreamed of streaming Minecraft's many wonderful music discs over radio? Well you can, with a radio jukebox. When placed, you can configure the channel like normal. Unlike a normal jukebox, the radio jukebox has a GUI.

pages.title: Gallery
pages.text: A radio jukebox playing music to its neighboring speaker.

pages.title: The Jukebox GUI
pages.text: To use the GUI, place discs into the disc slots. Adjust each disc's duration by scrolling over the number fields below. Do the same to adjust the pitch field on the left. You can enable or disable shuffling with the check box on the right. The play and skip buttons work as one might expect.
